sen.e: FUJIWARA no Kenshi (Kiyoko) (April 994-October 16, 1027) was the second daughter to FUJIWARA no Michinaga, who had the title of Sessho (Regent).

sen.e: It was already determined that Michinaga would eventually become the maternal grandfather and Sessho to the emperor if things went well, but he sent Kenshi to Emperor Sanjo, who he had little connection with, as the second safety net to gain the residence of imperial court.

sen.e: Since the emperor had already four sons with his queen FUJIWARA no Seishi (Sukeko) from the time when he was Togu (Crown Prince) and it was without a question that the destiny of Kenshi was to sire a male heir just like her older sister Shoshi.

sen.e: Even though Kenshi was frowned upon by her relatives due to her lavishness, she underwent a purification of her body and formal Buddhist service just before her death amd Michinaga clung to her and mourned "Where are you going, leaving behind old parents? Please let me accompany you" for the death of his second daughter following that of his youngest daughter Kishi.
